roleset.name: break some rule
roleset.note: VIOLATE-V NOTES: Sometimes the 'rule' is hidden within another entity, such as "Johnviolated the sanctity of Mary's diary". There's an implicit rulewhich says "don't read someone else's diary." (from violate.01-v)
VIOLATION-N NOTES: Based on verb entry violate.01; no corresponding VN class. (from violation.01-n)

example.name: they're all like this, basically
example.text: [Gulf Power]-1 had been under investigation for *trace*-1 violating the Utility Holding Company Act, which prohibits public utilities from making political contributions.
example.arg: the Utility Holding Company Act, which prohibits public utilities from making political contributions

example.name: they're all like this, basically
example.text: Without admitting or denying wrongdoing , they consented to findings that they had inaccurately represented the firm 's net capital , maintained inaccurate books and records , and made other violations .

example.name: All arguments
example.text: His violation of campaign laws is a pretty substantial crime.
